Use cases.description: Templates in 'Use cases' category should start with 'image_'

Utility.description: Templates in 'Utility' category should start with 'utility_'

Getting Started.description: Templates in 'Getting Started' category should start with 'gs_'

notes.general: Template names should be lowercase with underscores separating words (snake_case). Avoid using spaces, hyphens, or special characters.
bestPractices: Keep names descriptive but concise (under 50 characters)
Use underscores (_) instead of hyphens (-) or spaces
Include the main feature or purpose in the name
Add type prefix: video_, image_, or api_
Avoid version numbers in the template name (use metadata instead)
